name: ListApplePayDomains
description:
Retrieve a list of Apple Pay domains.

Use this tool to get a list of all Apple Pay domains associated with your Stripe account.

parameters.name: domain_name_filter
parameters.description: Filter the list by a specific domain name. Leave empty to return all domains.

parameters.name: pagination_ending_before_id
parameters.description: Object ID for pagination to fetch the previous page of the list.

value_schema.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `ending_before` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, starting with `obj_bar`, your subsequent call can include `ending_before=obj_bar` in order to fetch the previous page of the list.

parameters.name: expand_fields
parameters.description: An array of fields to expand in the response for additional details.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

parameters.name: max_domains_to_return
parameters.description: Specify the number of Apple Pay domains to retrieve, between 1 and 100. Defaults to 10 if not set.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

parameters.name: pagination_starting_after_cursor
parameters.description: An object ID for pagination to retrieve the next page of the list.

value_schema.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `starting_after` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, ending with `obj_foo`, your subsequent call can include `starting_after=obj_foo` in order to fetch the next page of the list.
